name: SupportGerikAndMarisa
_source: speak;Gerik;How're you doing?|Your sword still sharp?
speak;Gerik;You're not seriously injured or ill, are you?
speak;Gerik;I see.|So you can continue on?
speak;Gerik;Oh.|I'm the commander, you know?|I'm supposed to check on you now and then.|Well, see you later.
speak;Marisa;I'd like you to keep talking.|I don't mind talking to you.

speak;Gerik;You know, we've known each other for a long time, so I understand you...|But listen, Marisa, it wouldn't hurt you to be a bit more sociable.|Not for me, mind you, but some of the others have a hard time working with you.

speak;Gerik;Speaking of which, when I first met you, you were always working alone.|I remember thinking how odd that was.|I figured a woman as beautiful and talented as you would have men all around her.
speak;Gerik;You see, that's what I'm talking about!|Your beauty belies your words.
speak;Gerik;Um...sure, I guess.|I mean, doesn't everyone?|If you go to an inn, aren't the sociable gals the most popular?
speak;Marisa;I understand.|OK.|I'll be more sociable.|This better?
speak;Gerik;Listen, you've been acting a bit odd lately.|You don't talk to me as much as you used to.
speak;Gerik;Oh...|Because it's you I'm going to assume that you're serious.|You know what I said before?|I wasn't really serious, so don't worry about it.
speak;Marisa;But.|I've practiced.|I'm a bit more sociable.
speak;Gerik;In what way?|You don't appear to have changed at all.
speak;Gerik;What?|You're going to be sociable?|This I've got to see.|Well, go ahead.
speak;Marisa;Here goes...|Hello, Gerik!|Wonderful day for a battle, isn't it!
speak;Gerik;C'mon, Marisa, don't be like that.
speak;Gerik;I'm sorry, I didn't mean to laugh.|Are you still mad?
speak;Gerik;Forgive me.|I really and truly apologize.|Still mad?
speak;Gerik;Sigh.|OK, I get it.|What do I have to do to get you to forgive me?|I don't have much gold, but I could get you a snack...
speak;Marisa;You're the chief.|You don't have to apologize.|Just give orders.
speak;Gerik;Well, I know, but I was wrong.|I was the bad guy.|My crime was not being sensitive to your feelings.|I tell you what, I'll buy you anything you want.
speak;Marisa;You're soft.|Leaders are normally harsher than you.|You're too nice.|Too nice to all of us.|That's why...
speak;Gerik;Well, I said too much and I'm sorry.|You're fine just the way you are.
speak;Marisa;Th-then...|If you would...|I wouldn't be mad anymore.
speak;Gerik;C'mon, it wasn't nothing.|If it'll put you in a better mood, I don't have a problem with...
